document_data.name: Items for the Immortals
document_data.source: [[City of Delights| City of Delights (Gem of Zakhara)]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Items for the Immortals''' was a shop located in the [[Court District]] of [[Huzuz]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Location: Items for the Immortals was located within the Court District since only the residents of that lavish section of Huzuz could afford the price of most of the items sold by the shop.
document_data.Inhabitants: [[Essafah al-Jamila]] owned and operated this shop, selling goods needed by both [[genie]]s and [[sha'ir]]s.
